# 🏡 **Emergency Utilities Overview**

## ⚡ **Electricity – Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E)**
### **Company Description**
PG&E provides natural gas and electric service to Northern and Central California, including San Jose.

### **Contact Info**
- **Emergency Outage Line:** 1-800-743-5000
- **Website:** [www.pge.com](https://www.pge.com)
- **Outage Map:** [PG&E Outage Center](https://www.pge.com/outages)

### **Emergency Steps**
1. **Report Outage:** Call 1-800-743-5000 or use the PG&E app.
2. **Safety First:**
   - Turn off/unplug appliances to avoid surge damage.
   - Use flashlights (not candles) to prevent fire hazards.
3. **Generator Use:** Never operate indoors; follow manufacturer guidelines.

### **Recommended Kit Items**
- Backup power banks/solar chargers
- Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) for critical devices

---

## 🔥 **Natural Gas – Pacific Gas and Electric Company (PG&E)**
### **Company Description**
Same as electricity; PG&E manages gas infrastructure and safety.

### **Contact Info**
- **Gas Leak Emergency:** 1-800-743-5000 (immediate evacuation required)
- **Website:** [www.pge.com/gas](https://www.pge.com/gas)

### **Emergency Steps**
1. **If You Smell Gas:**
   - **Do not** use electrical switches, lighters, or phones.
   - **Evacuate** immediately and call 911 + PG&E.
2. **Shut Off Valve:** Locate your gas meter and know how to turn it off (use a wrench).

### **Recommended Kit Items**
- Gas shutoff wrench (near meter)
- Gas leak detector (optional)

---

## 💧 **Water – San Jose Water Company**
### **Company Description**
San Jose Water supplies potable water to the region and manages infrastructure.

### **Contact Info**
- **Emergency Line:** 1-408-279-7900
- **Website:** [www.sjwater.com](https://www.sjwater.com)

### **Emergency Steps**
1. **Report Leaks/Outages:** Call the emergency line.
2. **Conserve Water:** Fill bathtubs with water for sanitation during outages.
3. **Boil Water Advisory:** If issued, boil water for 1 minute before use.

### **Recommended Kit Items**
- Water purification tablets/filter
- Collapsible water containers

---

## 🌐 **Internet – Comcast**
### **Company Description**
Comcast provides cable internet and emergency communication services.

### **Contact Info**
- **Outage Support:** 1-800-XFINITY (1-800-934-6489)
- **Website:** [www.xfinity.com](https://www.xfinity.com)

### **Emergency Steps**
1. **Check Outage Status:** Use the Xfinity app or website.
2. **Backup Communication:**
   - Use mobile hotspots or public Wi-Fi (e.g., libraries).
   - Keep a list of emergency numbers offline.

### **Recommended Kit Items**
- Portable Wi-Fi hotspot
- Printed emergency contact list

---

# 🔹 **Final Notes**
- **Review/Update Kit Quarterly:** Replace expired items (food, water, batteries).
- **Practice Drills:** Test shutoff valves and evacuation routes.
- **Stay Informed:** Sign up for local alerts (e.g., [AlertSCC](https://www.sccgov.org/sites/alertscc)).

Use this runbook to ensure preparedness for San Jose-specific emergencies!
